sn56.39:1.1: “Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samana va brahmana va ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam nappajananti …pe…
sn56.39:1.2: ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam nappajananti, te annassa samanassa va brahmanassa va mukham ullokenti:
sn56.39:1.3: ‘ayam nuna bhavam janam janati, passam passati’ti.
sn56.39:2.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, tulapicu va kappasapicu va lahuko vatupadano same bhumibhage nikkhitto.
sn56.39:2.2: Tamenam puratthimo vato pacchimena samhareyya, pacchimo vato puratthimena samhareyya, uttaro vato dakkhinena samhareyya, dakkhino vato uttarena samhareyya.
sn56.39:2.5: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye hi keci samana va brahmana va ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam nappajananti …pe…
sn56.39:2.6: ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam nappajananti, te annassa samanassa va brahmanassa va mukham ullokenti:
sn56.39:2.7: ‘ayam nuna bhavam janam janati, passam passati’ti.
sn56.39:3.1: Ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, samana va brahmana va ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajananti …pe…
sn56.39:3.2: ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajananti, te na annassa samanassa va brahmanassa va mukham ullokenti:
sn56.39:3.3: ‘ayam nuna bhavam janam janati, passam passati’ti.
sn56.39:4.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ayokhilo va indakhilo va gambhiranemo sunikhato acalo asampakampi.
sn56.39:4.2: Puratthimaya cepi disaya agaccheyya bhusa vatavutthi, neva sankampeyya na sampakampeyya na sampacaleyya; pacchimaya cepi disaya …pe… uttaraya cepi disaya …pe… dakkhinaya cepi disaya agaccheyya bhusa vatavutthi, neva sankampeyya na sampakampeyya na sampacaleyya.
sn56.39:4.5: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye ca kho keci samana va brahmana va ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajananti …pe…
sn56.39:4.6: ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajananti, te na annassa samanassa va brahmanassa va mukham ullokenti:
sn56.39:4.7: ‘ayam nuna bhavam janam janati, passam passati’ti.
sn56.39:5.1: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, ‘idam dukkhan’ti yogo karaniyo …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yogo karaniyo”ti.
